items.sentence: Tom\'s picture is on the front page of today\'s newspaper.
I\'m not feeling well. Could you please send for a doctor?
That might not be as heavy as you think it\'s going to be.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time looking for my keys.
Tom was the only one who knew the combination to the safe.
Tom lived in that small house for a little over ten years.
Tom spent most of the morning straightening up his office.
Which of the books did you think was the most interesting?
I wish we could talk in person, but that\'ll have to wait.
I hate to tell you this, but Tom doesn\'t really like you.
Tom had changed so much that I didn\'t even recognize him.
The reason that happened was because you weren\'t careful.
I\'m still not used to getting up so early in the morning.
I\'ve made up my mind to work for a company in the States.
If I had a dime for every time I heard that, I\'d be rich.
Tom wanted to make sure that nothing bad happened to Mary.
Tom wanted to talk to Mary about what was going to happen.
Tom wants to find a place to live close to where he works.
Tom was a truck driver before he became a race car driver.
I don\'t know anybody who hasn\'t been sick at least once.
